Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass H.R. 3458 and the Federal Communications Commission to formalize strong network neutrality principles in order to ensure that the Internet will continue to foster innovation, increase competition, and spur economic growth as well as making the Internet faster and more affordable for all.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Congress to codify strong network neutrality principles in order to insure that the Internet will continue to foster innovation, increase competition, and spur economic growth.

Items.Title: Oversight:  Establishing Strong Network Neutrality Principles in Order to Protect the Internet.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight:  Establishing Strong Network Neutrality Principles in Order to Protect the Internet.

Items.Title: Oversight:  Establishing Strong Network Neutrality Principles in Order to Protect the Internet.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight:  Establishing Strong Network Neutrality Principles in Order to Protect the Internet.
